mapper.select: select SP.SUBWAY_MONTH month, SUM(SP.SUBWAY_RIDE) ride, SUM(SP.SUBWAY_QUIT) quit from SUBWAY_PASSENGER SP inner join SUBWAY_STATION SS on SP.SUBWAY_STATION_ID = SS.SUBWAY_STATION_ID and SS.SUBWAY_STATION_NAME LIKE '%동묘%' and SP.SUBWAY_YEAR = 2019 group by SP.SUBWAY_MONTH order by SP.SUBWAY_MONTH asc

select STORE_YEAR,STORE_BUNGI,STORE_SER_CODE_NAME,sum(STORE_SM_COUNT) as STORE_SM_COUNT from store where
STORE_CS_CODE_NAME = #{sector}
STORE_SER_CODE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{item.middle}||'%'
group by STORE_YEAR, STORE_BUNGI,STORE_SER_CODE_NAME order by store_year desc, STORE_BUNGI asc
select * from SALES_TEMP where SALES_SER_NAME like '%'||#{serName}||'%' and SALES_BD_NAME like '%'||#{storeName}||'%' and SALES_YEAR ='2019'
